revised_title: Investigation of Slow Neutron Velocities and Absorption Coefficients
tldr: The authors developed a velocity spectrometer to directly measure the velocities of slow neutrons. They used this apparatus to study the velocity distribution of thermal energy neutrons from a wax "howitzer" and investigated the variation of absorption coefficients of boron and cadmium with neutron velocity. This method provided a more accurate and precise way to study slow neutrons and their interactions with materials.
